page.title: 19Recreation (continued)
page.content: Activities include : snooker, darts, basketball, fottball, rounders, unihoc, badminton, volleyball, listening to records and eating! The senior club takes part in competitions organised by Perth and Kinross Association of Youth Clubs. The clubs are heldin the village hall. An aerobics class is held on Mondays, also in the village hall, 7.30p.m.-8.15p.m. The enrolment fee is Â£2 and the daily fee is Â£1.30. The attendances vary from 8-18 people, who come from the surrounding farms and the village itself. The age group is 14-50 years. The organiser changes her routine and music every 8-12 weeks. The organiser also has classes in other neighbouring villages.
